subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As the Phillies crankily held onto a two-run lead provided to them by Darin Ruf’s triple in the second inning, the Nationals celebrated their first division title when the Braves lost on Monday.
snippet: As the Phillies crankily held onto a two-run lead provided to them by Darin Ruf’s triple in the second inning, the Nationals celebrated their first division title when the Braves lost on Monday.
